test_cases.name: Torque Command Verification - Discrepancy Detection
test_cases.description: Verify that torque command discrepancies are detected within 100ms
test_cases.pass_criteria: Discrepancy flag set within 100ms when channels differ by >5%
test_cases.result: PASS - Discrepancy detected in 87ms avg, safe state activated

test_cases.name: Torque Command Verification - Safe State Transition
test_cases.description: Verify safe state is entered within 2 control cycles upon discrepancy
test_cases.pass_criteria: Zero torque output within 2ms (2 cycles at 1kHz)
test_cases.result: PASS - Safe state reached in 1.8ms avg

test_cases.name: Regenerative Braking - DC Bus Monitoring
test_cases.description: Verify continuous monitoring of DC bus voltage and current during regen
test_cases.pass_criteria: Voltage and current sampled every control cycle (1ms)
test_cases.result: PASS - Monitoring confirmed at 1kHz rate

test_cases.name: Regenerative Braking - Friction Brake Transition
test_cases.description: Verify friction brake activation when regen capability drops
test_cases.pass_criteria: Friction brakes engage within 200ms when regen <50%
test_cases.result: PASS - Avg transition time 165ms, deceleration maintained

test_cases.name: FOC Anti-Windup - Torque Limiting
test_cases.description: Verify anti-windup prevents integrator saturation during torque limits
test_cases.pass_criteria: Current controller tracking error <5% during saturation
test_cases.result: PASS - Anti-windup effective, tracking error 3.2%

test_cases.name: Torque Ripple Monitoring
test_cases.description: Verify torque ripple detection and measurement accuracy
test_cases.pass_criteria: Ripple measured within ±1% of actual value
test_cases.result: PASS - Measurement accuracy confirmed at 0.8% error

test_cases.name: Thermal Model Validation - Junction Temperature
test_cases.description: Verify IGBT junction temperature estimation accuracy
test_cases.pass_criteria: Estimated Tj within ±10°C of measured value
test_cases.result: PASS - Avg error 7.3°C across operating range

test_cases.name: Thermal Protection - Inverter Shutdown
test_cases.description: Verify inverter disables at junction temperature threshold
test_cases.pass_criteria: Inverter disabled within 50ms of Tj exceeding 150°C
test_cases.result: PASS - Shutdown in 38ms, HV contactors opened

test_cases.name: Coolant Monitoring - Dual Sensor Check
test_cases.description: Verify independent coolant temperature and flow sensors
test_cases.pass_criteria: Both sensors operational, plausibility check functional
test_cases.result: PASS - Both sensors reading, fault detection confirmed

test_cases.name: HV Isolation Monitoring - Measurement Method
test_cases.description: Verify 1kHz AC isolation measurement implementation
test_cases.pass_criteria: Isolation resistance measured with ±5% accuracy
test_cases.result: PASS - Measurement accuracy 3.2% across range

test_cases.name: HV Isolation - Contactor Opening Time
test_cases.description: Verify HV contactors open within timing requirement
test_cases.pass_criteria: Contactors fully open within 10ms of fault detection
test_cases.result: PASS - Avg opening time 8.3ms

test_cases.name: SOC Estimation - Coulomb Counting Algorithm
test_cases.description: Verify SOC estimation using coulomb counting with voltage correction
test_cases.pass_criteria: SOC error <5% over full discharge cycle
test_cases.result: PASS - Max error 4.2% at end of discharge

test_cases.name: Battery Protection - Progressive Power Limiting
test_cases.description: Verify power reduction from 10% to 5% SOC
test_cases.pass_criteria: Power limited progressively, vehicle remains controllable
test_cases.result: PASS - Progressive limiting confirmed, safe operation

test_cases.name: Speed Calculation - Resolver Update Rate
test_cases.description: Verify vehicle speed calculation at 10ms update rate
test_cases.pass_criteria: Speed updated every 10ms with <2% error
test_cases.result: PASS - 100Hz update confirmed, max error 1.5%

test_cases.name: Speed Plausibility - Multi-Sensor Check
test_cases.description: Verify speed plausibility using resolver and wheel speed sensors
test_cases.pass_criteria: Mismatch detected when sensors differ >5%
test_cases.result: PASS - Plausibility check functional, warning displayed

test_cases.name: DC Link Protection - Brake Chopper Activation
test_cases.description: Verify brake chopper activates at voltage threshold
test_cases.pass_criteria: Chopper active within 5ms of Vdc reaching 430V
test_cases.result: PASS - Activation in 3.2ms, voltage clamped at 432V

test_cases.name: Regen Power Limiting - Overvoltage Prevention
test_cases.description: Verify regen power limited when DC bus voltage high
test_cases.pass_criteria: Regen power reduced progressively from 420V threshold
test_cases.result: PASS - Progressive limiting confirmed on downhill test

test_cases.name: Gate Driver UVLO - Fault Detection
test_cases.description: Verify gate driver UVLO detection and safe shutdown
test_cases.pass_criteria: Fault detected within 10ms, inverter disabled
test_cases.result: PASS - UVLO detected in 6ms, safe shutdown confirmed

test_cases.name: IGBT Desaturation - Short Circuit Detection
test_cases.description: Verify IGBT short circuit detection via desaturation monitoring
test_cases.pass_criteria: Desat fault detected <2µs, gate turned off <500ns
test_cases.result: PASS - Detection 1.2µs, turn-off 380ns

test_cases.name: Current Sensor Plausibility - Phase Sum Check
test_cases.description: Verify phase current sum equals zero (Kirchhoff's law)
test_cases.pass_criteria: Sum of 3-phase currents <5% of rated current
test_cases.result: PASS - Phase sum 2.1% of rated, plausibility OK
